column4: Hello, need some help to make my webcam works on skype and xawtv at the same time : Its says that the device is busy. Could you help me ?
i doubt you'll get 2 programs to read your webcame at the same time
lenswipe:: need me to walk through having compiz turned off automatically on boot?
Can't it do that ? The preview image is very small on skype, and I want to see it better...
